p1: I have created a Discord server to allow users of Irish-Trad.net to interact with each other and discuss various topics regarding Irish Trad music.
p2: To join the Irish-Trad.net Discord Server simply click the following Icon or Button:
p4: Discord is a free platform that allows for live voice and text communication similar to Skype, Messenger and IRC channels of old.
p5: To get an idea of what a Discord server looks like you can click the following Image:
p8: Clicking on one of the specific channels found on the left brings you into that chatroom were you can discuss that particular topic.
p9: For more information about Discord you can visit the official Discord webpage here:
p11: Discord can be accessed through any web browser and downloaded as an application on desktop and mobile.
p12: The Discord icon can also be found in the footer of every page to make future access easier.
